title: [Large-Scale] Skill Analysis and Strategic Training for Cricket Batting Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic cricket rules and batting technique comprehension, along with foundational data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Conducting projects using simulation tools and analytical software in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and comparatively explain a cricket batter’s behavioral patterns (shot selection, technical efficiency) and cognitive strategies (focus on external outcomes) in a simulated environment.
Learners can produce a report quantitatively evaluating a batter’s performance outcomes (scoring, ball-contact accuracy) using data visualization tools.
Learners can analyze the impact of psychological factors (tension levels) on game performance by case and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
